quote: My very first listing was from my son, who was just seven years old.
why_clipworthy: It's a heartwarming story that highlights the importance of family support in business.
suggested_hook: Discover how a seven-year-old helped secure a first real estate listing!

quote: About 70% of the Hispanic population speaks English, so language isn't always a barrier.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the assumption that language is a major barrier in serving Hispanic clients.
suggested_hook: Think language is a barrier to serving Hispanic clients? Think again!
